casebody.data:
The State, ex rel. Rose, v. Radcliffe, Judge.

[Cite as State, ex rel. Eose, v. Eadcliffe (1988), 37 Ohio St. 3d 601.]

No. 87-1456 Submitted May 23, 1988 Decided June 29, 1988. James M. Daniels and Linda I. Sutton, for intervening relator Peggy Corey.

The motion for leave to intervene is granted.

Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., and Douglas, J., dissent. Douglas, J.,

dissenting. I would strike the motion. The action of the majority to grant a motion to intervene is impossible to understand. Case No. 88-783, the underlying basis for this motion, has been dismissed.
